Name: Almanac
Description: On your turn, you may look at the top card of the Artifact deck.

Name: Audit log
Description: Once per turn, you may look at one opponent's Contract card.

Name: Cup of java
Description: At the beginning of each Preparation phase, you may discard 1 card and draw 1 card.

Name: Dig 1
Description: Reveal the top Landscape card from your space

Name: Dig 2
Description: Reveal the top 2 Landscape cards from your space

Name: Dig 2
Description: Reveal the top 2 Landscape cards from your space

Name: Dig 3
Description: Reveal the top 3 Landscape cards from your space

Name: Geo-scanner
Description: You may always look at the top Landscape card below you.

Name: Inspector's Badge
Description: Once per turn, you may look at one opponent's Artifacts

Name: Lucky Coin
Description: Once per turn, when you draw an Artifact, you may look at it, return it to the bottom of the deck, and draw the next one.

Name: Shop Keys
Description: Once per turn, you may shuffle the 3 face-up Action cards into the deck, and draw 3 new face-up cards.

Name: Move
Description: Move 1 space.

Name: Move
Description: Move any number of spaces.

Name: Rotate
Description: Rotate left.

Name: Rotate
Description: Rotate right.

Name: Rotate
Description: Rotate to face the opposite direciton.

Name: Rotate
Description: Rotate to face any direction.

Name: Survey
Description: Choose a space adjacent (not diagonal) to you. Look at all of the Landscape cards there.

Name: Steal
Description: Steal an opponent's Equipment card. Trash this card.

Name: Trash
Description: Trash up to 3 cards from your draw pile and discard pile. Trash this card. Shuffle your deck.

Name: Tunnel
Description: If you are on a space lower than Topsoil, move to any space that is the same level as you.
